subject: Attention: Beneficiary.
body:
Attention: Beneficiary.             
Your unclaimed compensation has been registered via ATM CARD worth
US$2,700,000.00 with Courier Service Company with registration code of
( DCJKT00678G ). 
please kindly contact me with your delivery
information such as:.
 
Your Full Name,           
Your Address,           
Your Office Address,       
Your Nationality,       
Your Telephone Number,           
Your ID Copy and a picture
,           
Your Nearest Airport for delivery of your ATM CARD Package.          
The only fee required for you to pay is $95.00 for delivery and for the authorization and
documentation of your name on the legal documents as the rightful
beneficiary for the approval of said fund via ATM Card in your name.
 
Please kindly indicate the registration Number including your details
and Security keeping Fee only which was required from you up to the
delivery of your package down to your home as the rightful beneficiary
to the unclaimed compensation for scam victims.                       
 
Thank you for your understanding and God bless you as you furnish us
your details for Documentation of your name on the legal documents for
the delivery via ATM MASTER CARD.
 
Best Regards,               
Mrs. Angela Blake.

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Mrs. Angela Blake,

Thank you for reaching out to me about this unclaimed ATM card. It sounds like a wonderful opportunity, but I have a few questions before we proceed.

Firstly, could you please explain more about how my name came up for this unclaimed ATM card? Also, could you provide more details about the courier service company that will be handling the delivery?

Secondly, I'm curious about the legal documents you mentioned. What exactly are these documents and why is it necessary to have my name on them?

Lastly, regarding the fee required for delivery and security keeping, could you clarify how much this would be and how it should be paid?

I look forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Virginia

subject: Treat As Urgent .
body:
Can I view a copy of the email proposal  which was sent to you?

With that will strengthen me to be sure you are the rightful beneficiary.


Wish to acknowledge the receipt of your email response towards your
unclaimed compensation scam fund, your email was shortlisted among the
foreigners to be compensated for scam victim.

All legal documents will be issue out to you when you provide us your
details required for authorization and documentation of your name on the
legal documents for payment approval.

Itâ€™s very necessary to have your name on the legal documents as the
rightful beneficiary, for backing up your fund from your country government
if any question.

Regarding the required fee, stand for delivery and security keeping $350.00
and Stamp duty fee $200,00 only with this all legal documents will be
attach with the ATM Card to be deliver down to your home without any
further delay or additional charge.

Your details is necessary to be furnish to us, first, your name have to on
the claim file for Authorization and Documentation of your name on the
legal documents and your home address, where your package will be register
and deliver to. Your Direct Phone number where Pin Code of the ATM Card
will be directly sent to your phone for security purpose.

Your ID and two copies of your pictures for proper identification.

Thank you for your understanding and God bless you.

Best Regards.
Mrs. Angela Blake.
